post_content.caption: Russian Army Unit That Captured Avdiivka Honoured With 'Golden Star' By Putin's Minister | Watch
post_content.description:
Russia rewarded its armed forces for the capture of Avdiivka in Ukraine. The Defense Minister, Sergei Shoigu awarded the Center Group Commander with a "Golden Star". Russia captured Avdiivka last month, making it Moscow's most significant battleground gain since Bakhmut. Russia has now launched attacks on Kharkiv, Ukraine's second largest city. Watch the full video to know more.
